ta.title: ரூ.
body_lines: கல்வி அமைச்சர் சுசில் பிரேமாஜாயத் கூறுகையில், விடைரோலாஜிக்கல் டீனர்களின் (ஆன்லைன்) ஆட்சேர்ப்பு ரூ.

en.title: The Government of Rs.
body_lines: The Minister of Education Susil Premajayath said that the recruitment of Vidyrological Teaners' (online) was left to Rs.
He said that the previous Rs.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:

Minister of Education Susil Premajayath stated that the recruitment of online Vidyrological Teachers was assigned to Rs. He mentioned that this responsibility was previously handled by another entity. The statement provides insight into the current structure of teacher recruitment in the education sector.
